title: The cockpit voice recorder system consists of: - solid state…
caption_en: The cockpit voice recorder system consists of: - solid state cockpit voice recorder

title: The is located in the tailcone. itis painted bright internat…
caption_en: The is located in the tailcone. itis painted bright international orange with reflective tape to aid in recovery following a mishap. It also has an underwater locator beacon.

title: The is solid state recording device which provides 30 minute…
caption_en: The is solid state recording device which provides 30 minutes of recording. At the end of 30 minutes, new recording begins and old recording is erased. The process is repeated for as long as power is available.

title: The records 3 voice channels: - pilot's audio control panel …
caption_en: The records 3 voice channels: - pilot's audio control panel - co-pilot's audio control panel, and - cockpit area microphone.

title: These signals are amplified by the pre-amplifier before they…
caption_en: These signals are amplified by the pre-amplifier before they are passed to The recording is converted to digital format and stored in a crash protected memory.

title: The g-activated inertia switch is installed in series with t…
caption_en: The g-activated inertia switch is installed in series with the Should the aircraft be involved in a crash, the inertia switch will remove electrical power from the system and prevent erasure feature from functioning after crash impact.

title: When electrical power is applied to it performs a self-test …
caption_en: When electrical power is applied to it performs a self-test to determine the integrity of the system.

title: If a fault is detected at any time, a FAIL" message is displ…
caption_en: If a fault is detected at any time, a FAIL" message is displayed on the CAS.

title: The erase function is initiated by pressing the erase button…
caption_en: The erase function is initiated by pressing the erase button on the control panel. IRE

title: An interlocking devise only allows this function to work whe…
caption_en: An interlocking devise only allows this function to work when the airplane is on the ground and the parking brake is set.

title: When the erase function is complete, a 3 second tone is outp…
caption_en: When the erase function is complete, a 3 second tone is output to the headphone jack.
